com.facebook.buck.rules

Interface CacheableBuildRule

  • All Superinterfaces:
    BuildRule, Comparable<BuildRule>
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    ApkGenrule, Archive, CalculateClassAbi, CxxBinary, CxxGenrule, CxxLibrary, CxxLink, CxxPrecompiledHeaderTemplate, CxxPrefixHeader, CxxPreprocessAndCompile, CxxPythonExtension, CxxStrip, DefaultWorkerTool, DependencyAggregation, ExportFile, ExternallyBuiltApplePackage, Filegroup, Genrule, GenruleBinary, HeaderSymlinkTree, HeaderSymlinkTreeWithHeaderMap, JarFattener, JarGenrule, JsBundleGenrule, MergeThirdPartyJarResources, ModernBuildRule, PrebuiltCxxLibrary, PrebuiltJar, PrebuiltPythonLibrary, PreInclude, PythonBinary, PythonInPlaceBinary, PythonLibrary, PythonPackagedBinary, PythonTest, RemoteFile, RemoteFileBinary, ShBinary, ShTest, SymlinkTree, WriteFile, WriteFileHashCode, Zip

    public interface CacheableBuildRule
extends BuildRule
    Marks a build rule as safe to cache by ActionGraphNodeCache for incremental action graph construction.

    If a build rule is marked with this interface, then any build rule not directly associated with a target node that can potentially end up in this build rule's subgraph must also be marked with this interface.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Default Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      default SortedSet<BuildRule> getImplicitDepsForCaching()
      Returns any build rule dependencies of this rule for the sake of caching that are not returned as part of buildDeps or runtimeDeps.
      default void updateBuildRuleResolver(BuildRuleResolver ruleResolver, SourcePathRuleFinder ruleFinder, SourcePathResolver pathResolver)

      • Methods inherited from interface com.facebook.buck.rules.BuildRule

        appendToRuleKey, compareTo, getBuildDeps, getBuildSteps, getBuildTarget, getFullyQualifiedName, getProjectFilesystem, getProvider, getProviderCollection, getSourcePathToOutput, getType, hasProviders, isCacheable, outputFileCanBeCopied, toString

    • Method Detail

      • getImplicitDepsForCaching

        default SortedSet<BuildRule> getImplicitDepsForCaching()
        Returns any build rule dependencies of this rule for the sake of caching that are not returned as part of buildDeps or runtimeDeps.

        Most build rules do not need to worry about this, but due to funky action graph construction scenarios, some build rules do not actually parent nodes that are logically associated with those build rules. E.g. CxxLibrary is a dummy node that does not directly parent the build rules associated with compiling and linking the library, which caching needs to be made aware of to avoid unnecessarily recreating the associated build rules.

      • updateBuildRuleResolver

        default void updateBuildRuleResolver(BuildRuleResolver ruleResolver,
                                     SourcePathRuleFinder ruleFinder,
                                     SourcePathResolver pathResolver)
        Updates the build rule resolver and associated objects for this build rule.

        Build rules sometimes hold field references to build rule resolvers. If this build rule is to be cached, it must update its build rule resolver when a new action graph is constructed to avoid leaking the entire action graph it was originally associated with.
